welcome_info_ltf_desc: Our wallet has some of the lowest transaction levels on the TON blockchain network in the world. We are working to make sure that you pay even less.
welcome_info_cgp_desc: Massive support for tokens of a large number of game projects created on the basis of the TON blockchain. Tokenization of everyday products.
welcome_info_dsl_desc: High level of personal data security. Full responsibility for the decentralization of all information.
add_wallet_btn_new_desc: Create a new custom wallet in two clicks
add_wallet_btn_existing_desc: Add an existing wallet using a 24-word secret key.
